parameters.prompt: dream-pop, nostalgic, melancholic, synthesizer, soft-drums, layered-vocals, reverb-heavy, twilight-vibes
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The streetlights hum a lullaby, the pavement still remembers you [chorus] We were just ghosts in the neon glow, passing through like midnight radio [verse] Your laughter lives in Polaroids, fading slow but never gone [chorus] We were just ghosts in the neon glow, passing through like midnight radio [bridge] Static whispers on the AM band, a song we used to understand [outro] The dial spins but finds no end, just echoes of what might have been
